GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles sorted by descending date order by default and allows filtering by a valid topic query as well as taking queries for sorting by all columns (except IMG URL) by ascending or descending order. P and limit queries will return total number of articles value, attached to each, to allow for returning of selected number articles for pagination

queries.sort_by: sort by the following columns: author, title, article_id, topic, created_at, votes, comment_count

queries.order: order sort_by by asc or desc

queries.limit: returns number of articles accoring to value given, default 10

queries.p: will offset the articles selected with limit and p, deafult 1

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves up a json object of article with corresponding input

exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge
exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for the given article, sorted by descending date order

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comment.description: posts a comment, of username and body, to the specified article and returns the full comment object

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates vote according to input body, returning an object of the updated article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users.description: returns an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: returns user object of matching username

PATCH /api/comments/:commment_id.description: updates vote according to input body, returning an object of the updated article
